title: Stuck in a Lobby (very common atm :/)
body:
I'm currently stuck in a lobby from earlier in the day, wouldn't fix itself after restarting multiple times.
Please help. Cheers.

replies.body:
Its fixed now, not sure if you fellas had anything to do with it. Thanks for your time anyhow.
The only other way however to fix it apparently is to re invite those who you had in the lobby before hand.

Hey

Thanks for posting this - sorry to hear you're stuck :(

Are you still stuck today or did it fix itself up eventually?

Mindstar
